name: Treachery
text:
Enchant creature
When Treachery enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands.
You control enchanted creature.
flavor:
"The academy educates; I employ. It's a perfect arrangement."
—Gatha, Tolarian renegade
originalText:
When Treachery comes into play, untap up to five lands.
You control enchanted creature.

rulings.text: You choose which lands to untap as the triggered ability resolves. They aren’t targeted, and they don’t have to be lands that you control.
